        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1043</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Surviving a Disaster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überleben ein Unfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survivant un désastre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sobrevivendo um disastre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sopravvivendo un disastro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιβίωση μιας καταστροφής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sobreviviendo un desastre</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Find out how several people survived natural disasters.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan. Survivors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disastor</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Finden Sie heraus, wie einige Leute 
Naturkatastrophen überlebten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Découvrez comment plusieurs personnes ont 
survécu des désastres normaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontre para fora como diversos povos 
sobreviveram disastres naturais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scopra come parecchia gente è sopravvissuto 
disastri naturali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανακαλύψτε πώς διάφοροι άνθρωποι επέζησαν των 
φυσικών καταστροφών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descubra cómo sobrevivieron varios personas los 
desastres naturales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan. Überlebende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">disastor</string>
          </keyword>
